Democratic and Republican Renewal (abbreviated RDR-Tchanji) was a political party in Niger.
History
The party was founded on 16 April 2020 by former President of Niger Mahamane Ousmane, who serves as the party's president.
Electoral performance
* 2020â€“21 Nigerien general election, second place in the presidential race, 7 seats in the National Assembly.
External links
* [https://rdr-tchanji.com/ Official website]
